text: Le Mesnil-Eudes is a commune. It is in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. About 250 people live there. == Geography == Le Mesnil-Eudes is in the area called Pays d'Auge. The village is about 8 kilometers south-west of Lisieux and 13 kilometers north of Livarot. Most of the land in the commune is used for farming. In 2018, about 88.5% of the land was used for agriculture, mostly for grass fields and crops. About 6.6% of the land was covered by forests. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Le Mesnil-Eudes
